trans-unit.source: If you had previously set up a pubCenter payout account for your Microsoft Advertising earnings, that account will no longer be used for payments as of April 1st, 2016.
trans-unit.target: If you had previously set up a pubCenter payout account for your Microsoft Advertising earnings, that account will no longer be used for payments as of April 1st, 2016.

trans-unit.source: Your payments will now be made through your Dev Center payout account.
trans-unit.target: Your payments will now be made through your Dev Center payout account.

trans-unit.source: pubCenter-DevCenter payout account and tax profile consolidation
trans-unit.target: pubCenter-DevCenter payout account and tax profile consolidation

trans-unit.source: pubCenter-DevCenter payout account and tax profile consolidation
trans-unit.target: pubCenter-DevCenter payout account and tax profile consolidation

trans-unit.source: If you had previously set up a pubCenter payout account for your Microsoft Advertising earnings, that account will no longer be used for payments as of April 1st, 2016.
trans-unit.target: If you had previously set up a pubCenter payout account for your Microsoft Advertising earnings, that account will no longer be used for payments as of April 1st, 2016.

trans-unit.source: Your payments will now be made through your Dev Center payout account.
trans-unit.target: Your payments will now be made through your Dev Center payout account.

trans-unit.source: To ensure any payments due are submitted on time, please sign in to your Dev Center dashboard before March 31, 2016, and confirm that your [payout account and tax profile](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md) are set up correctly and are up to date.
trans-unit.target: To ensure any payments due are submitted on time, please sign in to your Dev Center dashboard before March 31, 2016, and confirm that your [payout account and tax profile](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md) are set up correctly and are up to date.

trans-unit.source: **Important** If you have never set up your payout account or tax profile in Dev Center, you’ll need to do that before March 31, 2016.
trans-unit.target: **Important** If you have never set up your payout account or tax profile in Dev Center, you’ll need to do that before March 31, 2016.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Setting up your payout account and tax forms](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Setting up your payout account and tax forms](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md).

trans-unit.source: For more info about payments in Dev Center, see [Payout summary](payout-summary.md).
trans-unit.target: For more info about payments in Dev Center, see [Payout summary](payout-summary.md).

trans-unit.source: For info about currencies used for payouts in different countries and regions, see [Developer account and app-submission markets](../get-started/account-types-locations-and-fees.md#account_markets).
trans-unit.target: For info about currencies used for payouts in different countries and regions, see [Developer account and app-submission markets](../get-started/account-types-locations-and-fees.md#account_markets).

trans-unit.source: We also suggest reviewing the FAQ below for more info about specific scenarios.
trans-unit.target: We also suggest reviewing the FAQ below for more info about specific scenarios.

trans-unit.source: Frequently asked questions
trans-unit.target: Frequently asked questions

trans-unit.source: What account will be used for my March 2016 payout?
trans-unit.target: What account will be used for my March 2016 payout?

trans-unit.source: In March 2016, we will still use the payout account and tax profile that you set up in pubCenter.
trans-unit.target: In March 2016, we will still use the payout account and tax profile that you set up in pubCenter.

trans-unit.source: This will be the last time we use this information.
trans-unit.target: This will be the last time we use this information.

trans-unit.source: Starting on April 1st, 2016, your Microsoft Advertising earnings will be paid to the PayPal or Bank account that you set up in Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: Starting on April 1st, 2016, your Microsoft Advertising earnings will be paid to the PayPal or Bank account that you set up in Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: I have my pubCenter and DevCenter accounts registered with the same Microsoft account in the same region/country.
trans-unit.target: I have my pubCenter and DevCenter accounts registered with the same Microsoft account in the same region/country.

trans-unit.source: How will I receive my money?
trans-unit.target: How will I receive my money?

trans-unit.source: Your Microsoft Advertising earnings will be paid to your the payout account (PayPal or bank account) that you set up in Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: Your Microsoft Advertising earnings will be paid to your the payout account (PayPal or bank account) that you set up in Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: I have my pubCenter and DevCenter accounts registered with the same Microsoft Account but in different regions/countries.
trans-unit.target: I have my pubCenter and DevCenter accounts registered with the same Microsoft Account but in different regions/countries.

trans-unit.source: How will I receive my money?
trans-unit.target: How will I receive my money?

trans-unit.source: Your Microsoft Advertising earnings will be paid to the payout account (PayPal or bank account) that you set up in Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: Your Microsoft Advertising earnings will be paid to the payout account (PayPal or bank account) that you set up in Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: The payout amount will be converted to the currency of your Dev Center account country or region.
trans-unit.target: The payout amount will be converted to the currency of your Dev Center account country or region.

trans-unit.source: I have manually linked my pubCenter accounts to my DevCenter accounts.
trans-unit.target: I have manually linked my pubCenter accounts to my DevCenter accounts.

trans-unit.source: Where will I receive my Microsoft Advertising earnings?
trans-unit.target: Where will I receive my Microsoft Advertising earnings?

trans-unit.source: You will receive a single payout for the Microsoft Advertising earnings from all your linked pubCenter accounts in the payout account (PayPal or bank account) that you set up in Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: You will receive a single payout for the Microsoft Advertising earnings from all your linked pubCenter accounts in the payout account (PayPal or bank account) that you set up in Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: The payout amount will be converted to the currency of your Dev Center account country or region.
trans-unit.target: The payout amount will be converted to the currency of your Dev Center account country or region.

trans-unit.source: I had multiple pubCenter accounts registered with the same publisher.
trans-unit.target: I had multiple pubCenter accounts registered with the same publisher.

trans-unit.source: How will I receive my earnings for all these accounts?
trans-unit.target: How will I receive my earnings for all these accounts?

trans-unit.source: You will receive a single payout for the Microsoft Advertising earnings from all your linked pubCenter accounts in the payout account (PayPal or bank account) that you set up in Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: You will receive a single payout for the Microsoft Advertising earnings from all your linked pubCenter accounts in the payout account (PayPal or bank account) that you set up in Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: The payout amount will be converted to the currency of your Dev Center account country or region.
trans-unit.target: The payout amount will be converted to the currency of your Dev Center account country or region.

trans-unit.source: I had multiple pubCenter accounts registered with different tax profiles in pubCenter.
trans-unit.target: I had multiple pubCenter accounts registered with different tax profiles in pubCenter.

trans-unit.source: Why do I only see one tax profile in DevCenter?
trans-unit.target: Why do I only see one tax profile in DevCenter?

trans-unit.source: Your DevCenter account has a single tax profile that will be used for all your payouts.
trans-unit.target: Your DevCenter account has a single tax profile that will be used for all your payouts.

trans-unit.source: Visit [Setting up your payout account and tax forms](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md) to learn about setting up and managing your payment and tax information in Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: Visit [Setting up your payout account and tax forms](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md) to learn about setting up and managing your payment and tax information in Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: Why was my payout converted to a different currency?
trans-unit.target: Why was my payout converted to a different currency?

trans-unit.source: Your Microsoft Advertising earnings will be converted and paid to the payout account (PayPal or bank account) that you set up in Dev Center .
trans-unit.target: Your Microsoft Advertising earnings will be converted and paid to the payout account (PayPal or bank account) that you set up in Dev Center .

trans-unit.source: If your pubCenter account country did not match your Dev Center account country, you will be paid in the currency associated with your Dev Center account country.
trans-unit.target: If your pubCenter account country did not match your Dev Center account country, you will be paid in the currency associated with your Dev Center account country.

trans-unit.source: Why was my payout sent to a different PayPal or bank account?
trans-unit.target: Why was my payout sent to a different PayPal or bank account?

trans-unit.source: This can happen if you had set up different payout accounts (PayPal or bank accounts) in Dev Center and pubCenter.
trans-unit.target: This can happen if you had set up different payout accounts (PayPal or bank accounts) in Dev Center and pubCenter.

trans-unit.source: As of April 1st, 2016, all Microsoft Advertising payouts will be made to the payout account that you set up in Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: As of April 1st, 2016, all Microsoft Advertising payouts will be made to the payout account that you set up in Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: Why didn’t I receive my Microsoft Advertising payout this month?
trans-unit.target: Why didn’t I receive my Microsoft Advertising payout this month?

trans-unit.source: This is usually due to one or more of the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: This is usually due to one or more of the following reasons:

trans-unit.source: Your [payout account and tax profile details](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md) were not set up correctly in Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: Your [payout account and tax profile details](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md) were not set up correctly in Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: Your pubCenter account has not been [linked to your Dev Center account](pubcenter-dev-center-integration.md).
trans-unit.target: Your pubCenter account has not been [linked to your Dev Center account](pubcenter-dev-center-integration.md).

trans-unit.source: How can I check the payout account and tax profile that will be used for payout in DevCenter?
trans-unit.target: How can I check the payout account and tax profile that will be used for payout in DevCenter?

trans-unit.source: Visit [Setting up your payout account and tax forms](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md) to learn how to view (and edit if necessary) your payment and tax information in Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: Visit [Setting up your payout account and tax forms](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md) to learn how to view (and edit if necessary) your payment and tax information in Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: I still see my tax profile and payout account information in pubCenter.
trans-unit.target: I still see my tax profile and payout account information in pubCenter.

trans-unit.source: Will these be used for my payout?
trans-unit.target: Will these be used for my payout?

trans-unit.source: No, your pubCenter payout account and tax profile information will no longer be used for payments starting April 1st, 2016.
trans-unit.target: No, your pubCenter payout account and tax profile information will no longer be used for payments starting April 1st, 2016.

trans-unit.source: Visit [Setting up your payout account and tax forms](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md) to learn how to set up and manage your payment and tax information in Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: Visit [Setting up your payout account and tax forms](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md) to learn how to set up and manage your payment and tax information in Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: Can I still manage my tax profile and payout account information in pubCenter?
trans-unit.target: Can I still manage my tax profile and payout account information in pubCenter?

trans-unit.source: No, your pubCenter payout account and tax profile information will no longer be used for payments as of April 1st, 2016.
trans-unit.target: No, your pubCenter payout account and tax profile information will no longer be used for payments as of April 1st, 2016.

trans-unit.source: Visit [Setting up your payout account and tax forms](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md) to learn how to set up and manage your payment and tax information in Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: Visit [Setting up your payout account and tax forms](setting-up-your-payout-account-and-tax-forms.md) to learn how to set up and manage your payment and tax information in Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: If I need help with my payouts, whom do I contact?
trans-unit.target: If I need help with my payouts, whom do I contact?

trans-unit.source: For any questions or inquiries, please open a [support ticket](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=733342).
trans-unit.target: For any questions or inquiries, please open a [support ticket](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=733342).
